entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3 except temperature steady near minus 8 over the Highlands. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3 except temperature steady near minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
